content: after designing this top and putting it on i couldn t stop smiling i thought it was only fitting that i give it the spanish word for smile sonrisa the design includes an interesting touch of beadwork and an attractive handkerchief edge in both the hem and sleeves you will be smiling as well once you see how flattering this style is on you this design is stitched in j&p coats royale fashion 3 crochet thread using d e and f hooks the beads are size 6/0 which i purchased here 1 at fire mountain gems the written instructions for this design will be available in six sizes the sizes will be based on the underbust measurement of 36 38 40 42 44 46 and 48 this will typically fit actual chest measurements of 40 42 44 46 48 50 and 52 additional instructions and suggestions will be provided including applying the pattern to larger or shorter than average or larger or smaller bust note reformatted and republished march 28 2016 1 http //www firemountaingems com/details asp pn=h205143sb
